name: Make Art (ainsley)
description:
Hello and welcome to Make Art, a game about drawing!

Draw simple prompts with Marcel, a silly AI who is... not very artistically inclined. There's also a Free Draw mode, which allows you to create whatever you'd like :-)

Music Clair De Lune - Debussy Nocturne Op. No. 9 in E-flat major - Chopin Gymnopedie No. 1 - Satie
